game.name: TS Marketplace: Hbis-tt Wagon Pack 01
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Hbis-tt is a sliding wall box wagon that is a conversion of the Hbills wagons, featuring large sliding doors and a spacious interior, the wagons are for transporting light car parts.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Hbis-tt is a sliding wall box wagon that is a conversion of the Hbills wagons, featuring large sliding doors and a spacious interior, the wagons are for transporting light car parts.
